group_1.narration: Encounters with destiny are always sudden.
The worst part is that you aren't allowed@to prepare yourself beforehand.
Just like the reunion in "Step-up Saki-chan" @when she finally meets the senior she admires again...

group_1.textRight: Here you go, Ma'am. Blend number 18.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you.
[chara:305050:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]......!

group_1.narration: I was at my favorite cafe when she suddenly called out to me.
And there next to me, was a smiling Mami Tomoe.

group_1.textLeft: (M-M-Miss Mami!?)
(Wh-why is my beloved Mami, here? In this cafe?)
(And at the next table over? How could I not notice @that before!)

group_1.textRight: I hope I didn't startle you by calling out so suddenly?
I was just so happy to see someone ordering the @same tea.

group_1.narration: Despite my excitement, the next words @to come out of my mouth were...

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* Yes, this cafe's blend 18 is the best @afternoon tea.
I have never tasted anything else like it in my life!
A blended tea, carefully chosen by the cafe's owner.
All of the original blends here are wonderful, but.
The number 12 blend which is one of their classics, is especially nice for morning tea.

group_1.textRight: Yes, yes! 18 is definitely a better choice for @afternoons!
I'm so happy to meet someone with similar tastes.

group_1.textLeft: (...How wonderful!)
(I can't believe we just started casually talking about tea!)
...Pardon the late introduction, I am Yuuna Kaharu.
I am a second year at St. Liliana Academy.

group_1.textRight: Eh?... Oh... a high school second year...?
...I'm sorry I didn't mean to be overly familiar!
I am Mami Tomoe, a third year at Mitakihara Junior High.

group_1.textLeft: (I already know that~!)

group_1.textRight: I like the tea blends here, so I stop by whenever I am @in Kamihama.
After enjoying the tea, I always buy some tea leaves @to bring home too.

group_1.textLeft: (Ah, I didn't realize she was a regular?...)

group_1.textRight: You seem to know this shop fairly well Yuuna...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, yes I come here often...
...It was all so very exciting!
She even agreed to talk the next time we met!
[chara:305001:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]It was a promise~.

group_1.textRight: You always got so emotional just watching from a distance, but I guess when it comes down to it, @you got what it takes.
Were you there to buy tea Yuuna?

group_1.textLeft: Yes.
The maids buy tea from there, and we always keep some in the mansion.
But when it comes to gifts, I always try to buy it @myself.
A present for the hospital event tomorrow.
